port.description: The port the virtual server listens on.

protocol.description: The protocol the virtual server is operating.

bytes_in_lo.description: Bytes received by this virtual server from clients ( low 32bits ).

bytes_in_hi.description: Bytes received by this virtual server from clients ( high 32bits ).

bytes_out_lo.description: Bytes sent by this virtual server to clients ( low 32bits ).

bytes_out_hi.description: Bytes sent by this virtual server to clients ( high 32bits ).

current_conn.description: TCP connections currently established to this virtual server.

max_conn.description: Maximum number of simultaneous TCP connections this virtual server has processed at any one time.

total_conn.description: Requests received by this virtual server.

discard.description: Connections discarded by this virtual server.

direct_replies.description: Direct replies from this virtual server, without forwarding to a node.

connect_timed_out.description: Connections closed by this virtual server because the 'connect_timeout' interval was exceeded.

data_timed_out.description: Connections closed by this virtual server because the 'timeout' interval was exceeded.

keepalive_timed_out.description: Connections closed by this virtual server because the 'keepalive_timeout' interval was exceeded.

udp_timed_out.description: Connections closed by this virtual server because the 'udp_timeout' interval was exceeded.

total_dgram.description: UDP datagrams processed by this virtual server.

gzip.description: Responses which have been compressed by content compression.

gzip_bytes_saved_lo.description: Bytes of network traffic saved by content compression ( low 32bits ).

gzip_bytes_saved_hi.description: Bytes of network traffic saved by content compression ( high 32bits ).

http_rewrite_location.description: HTTP Location headers, supplied by a node, that have been rewritten.

http_rewrite_cookie.description: HTTP Set-Cookie headers, supplied by a node, that have been rewritten.

http_cache_hits.description: HTTP responses sent directly from the web cache by this virtual server.

http_cache_lookups.description: HTTP requests that are looked up in the web cache by this virtual server.

http_cache_hit_rate.description: Percentage hit rate of the web cache for this virtual server.

sip_total_calls.description: Total number of SIP INVITE requests seen by this virtual server.

sip_rejected_requests.description: Number of SIP requests rejected due to them exceeding the maximum amount of memory allocated to the connection.

connection_errors.description: Number of transaction or protocol errors in this virtual server.

connection_failures.description: Number of connection failures in this virtual server.

bytes_in.description: Bytes received by this virtual server from clients.

bytes_out.description: Bytes sent by this virtual server to clients.

gzip_bytes_saved.description: Bytes of network traffic saved by content compression.

cert_status_requests.description: Number of incoming TLS handshakes for this virtual server with certificate status requests.

cert_status_responses.description: Number of incoming TLS handshakes for this virtual server to which certificate status responses were attached.

max_duration_timed_out.description: Connections closed by this virtual server because the 'max_transaction_duration' interval was exceeded.

processing_timed_out.description: Connections closed by this virtual server because the 'timeout' interval was exceeded while waiting for rules or external processing.
